title: Patriots vs. Bills live updates: Will Patriots clinch AFC East title?

title: Mass. travel agent accused of defrauding Florida students out of $400K arrested
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The man allegedly told students his travel agency was going out of business and had no money to offer refunds one month before the trip.

By Darin Zullo December 14, 2025 | 11:05 AM 2 minutes to read A Marblehead man was arrested Friday in California after allegedly defrauding more than 100 high school students and chaperones in Florida out of $400,000, authorities said.

title: Tewksbury woman facing attempted murder charges after stabbing at Macy’s in NYC
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The woman allegedly claimed she could hear voices in her head telling her to kill someone in the store or she would be killed.
A mother of three was stabbed Thursday at the Macy's flagship store in Manhattan.

Angelina Katsanis/AP Photo By Darin Zullo December 14, 2025 | 10:46 AM 2 minutes to read A Tewksbury woman is facing an attempted murder charge after she allegedly stabbed another woman repeatedly Thursday at the Macy’s Herald Square store in Manhattan.

title: Deer hunting season expanded in Mass. amid ballooning population
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Environment New regulations will expand the deer hunting season on Martha’s Vineyard and Nantucket this winter and in fall 2026.
Officials have announced that this winter's deer hunting season will be expanded on Martha's Vineyard and Nantucket.
